H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4422.def: = action by which humans move away as fast as possible from a place that is considered insecure ► in order to save their lives

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H2976.def: = process by which someone resigns to being unable to change a situation, and gives up trying to do so

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H1366.def: = a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H397.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Maoch<SDBH:מָעֹוךְ>}, also known as {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}; ► king of {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}

H4582.def: = man, also known as {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}; ► father of {L:Achish<SDBH:אָכִישׁ>}, king of {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H1661.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1661.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H397.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Maoch<SDBH:מָעֹוךְ>}, also known as {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}; ► king of {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H3158.def: = inhabitant of town or valley of {L:Jezreel<SDBH:יִזְרְעֶאל>}

H26.def: = woman, also known as {L:Abigal<SDBH:אֲבִיגַל>}; ► wife of {L:Nabal<SDBH:נָבָל>}, who later married king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3761.def: = inhabitant of {L:Carmel<SDBH:כַּרְמֶל>}, ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5037.def: = foolish person who has no respect for God or his fellow human beings but thinks highly of himself

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H1272.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H1661.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H3254.def: = action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H397.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Maoch<SDBH:מָעֹוךְ>}, also known as {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}; ► king of {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H2580.def: = state in which someone or something is physically attractive; ► which may bring about a favorable attitude in others

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H397.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Maoch<SDBH:מָעֹוךְ>}, also known as {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}; ► king of {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}

H6860.def: = town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}; ► belonged to {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>} and given to {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} before he moved to {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>} where he was made king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H2421.def: = process by which humans are alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H1581.def: = large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7017.def: = ethnic group; ◄ possibly descendants of {L:Cain<SDBH:קַיִן>}; ► ally of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; associated with {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}' father-in-law
